Package org.opensourcephysics.controls

Class Cryptic

java.lang.Object
org.opensourcephysics.controls.Cryptic
public class Cryptic extends Object
A class to represent an encrypted version of a UTF-8-encoded String.
Version:
1.0 May 2006
Author:
Doug Brown
